scripts.dev: pnpm run dev:api & pnpm run dev:web
scripts.dev:api: cd bank-statements-api && DATABASE_URL=postgresql+psycopg://postgres:postgres@localhost:54321/bank_statements uv run python run.py
scripts.test: pnpm run test:unit && pnpm run test:integration && pnpm run test:web
scripts.test:unit: cd bank-statements-api && uv run pytest tests/unit tests/api tests/services -v
scripts.test:integration: pnpm run test:db:up && sleep 5 && pnpm run test:db:migrate && cd bank-statements-api && TEST_DATABASE_URL=postgresql+psycopg://postgres:postgres@localhost:15432/bank_statements_test DATABASE_URL=postgresql+psycopg://postgres:postgres@localhost:15432/bank_statements_test uv run pytest tests/integration test_saved_filters_api.py -v; pnpm run test:db:down
scripts.test:api: cd bank-statements-api && uv run pytest tests/unit tests/api tests/services
scripts.test:api:cov: cd bank-statements-api && uv run pytest tests/unit tests/api tests/services --cov
scripts.test:e2e: cd e2e/bank-statements-web && API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8010 VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:8010 pnpm run test
scripts.test:e2e:ui: cd e2e/bank-statements-web && API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8010 VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:8010 pnpm run test:ui
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:api && pnpm run lint:web
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run lint:api:fix && pnpm run lint:web:fix
scripts.lint:api: cd bank-statements-api && uv run ruff check .
scripts.lint:api:fix: cd bank-statements-api && uv run ruff check . --fix
scripts.format: pnpm run format:api && pnpm run format:web
scripts.format:api: cd bank-statements-api && uv run black . && uv run isort .
scripts.check:api: cd bank-statements-api && uv run isort . --check-only && uv run black . --check && uv run ruff check .
scripts.db:migrate: cd bank-statements-api && DATABASE_URL=postgresql+psycopg://postgres:postgres@localhost:54321/bank_statements uv run alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:backup: mkdir -p backups && docker exec bank-statements-db pg_dump -U postgres -d bank_statements -F c > backups/bank_statements_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).dump && echo 'Backup created in backups/ directory'
scripts.db:restore: test -n "$FILE" || (echo 'Usage: FILE=backups/your_backup.dump pnpm db:restore' && exit 1) && docker exec -i bank-statements-db pg_restore -U postgres -d bank_statements -c < "$FILE"
scripts.test:db:migrate: cd bank-statements-api && DATABASE_URL=postgresql+psycopg://postgres:postgres@localhost:15432/bank_statements_test uv run alembic upgrade dc07aa0a9f15
scripts.install: pnpm install:web && pnpm install:e2e && pnpm install:api
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:web && pnpm run clean:api
scripts.reset: pnpm run clean && pnpm run install
